content:
I've imported some synthea data into US Core and I am getting validation errors:

The extension http://synthetichealth.github.io/synthea/disability-adjusted-life-years is unknown, and not allowed here
The extension http://synthetichealth.github.io/synthea/quality-adjusted-life-years is unknown, and not allowed here

Shouldn't Custom extensions be ignored by validator?
All extensions in core examples are expected to be registered - because implementers might use them.
These are not core examples but in an IG.
If it's an HL7-published IG, the rules are the same.
